lines.content: ### Create, list, delete and find tasks of types todo, deadline and event
Mark your task as complete or incomplete as deemed necessary
Store the data into a text file so that you dont need to retype
**Format:** `todo TASK_DESCRIPTION` - Create a new task of type todo
**Description of command :**  Add a todo task with a description.
Acknowledgement and total number of tasks in list.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 1 tasks in the list.
**Format:** `deadline TASK_DESCRIPTION /by DUE_DATE DUE_TIME` - Create a new task of type deadline
**Description of command :**  Add a deadline task with a description.
Acknowledgement and total number of tasks in list.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
**Format:** `event TASK_DESCRIPTION /at DAY TIME` - Create a new task of type event
**Description of command :**  Add a event task with a description.
Acknowledgement and total number of tasks in list.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
**Description of command :**  list all tasks with its status
All tasks, its status and total number of tasks in list.
Here are the tasks in your list:
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
**Description of command :**  Show all tasks with descriptions containing the search term
Here are the tasks in your list:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
**Description of command :**  Mark task number in list as complete
Task 2 will be marked as complete
Nice! I've marked this task as done:
**Description of command :**  Mark task number in list as imcomplete
Task 2 will be marked as incomplete
Ok I have marked this task as incomplete:
**Description of command :**  Delete task number in list
Ok I have deleted this task as requested:
Here are the tasks in your list:
**Description of command :**  Exit program and save list to file
Bye. Hope to see you again soon!
Bye. Hope to see you again soon!
* Duke is a CLI app to keep track of todos, deadlines and events
* Main method of Duke app, creates UI object to show welcome message and populates from taskFile, read's input till user types exit
public static void main(String[] args) throws FileNotFoundException {
* This class is to parse the various parameters of the command
* Returns the first word of command (before the first space)
* @param command command String to perform extraction on
* Returns a Task from task list with the specified index.
* @param command command String to get task details from
* Returns task number from the input string for mark and unmark section
* @param input command String to task number from
* This class is used to store and retrieve to file
private static final String HOME_PATH = System.getProperty("user.dir");

fw.write( taskInList.getType() + TASK_DETAILS_SEPERATOR + taskInList.getStatusIcon() + TASK_DETAILS_SEPERATOR + taskInList.getTaskName() + TASK_DETAILS_SEPERATOR + ((Event) taskInList).getAt() + NEW_LINE);

fw.write( taskInList.getType() + TASK_DETAILS_SEPERATOR + taskInList.getStatusIcon() + TASK_DETAILS_SEPERATOR + taskInList.getTaskName() + TASK_DETAILS_SEPERATOR + "/by " + ((Deadline) taskInList).getBy() + NEW_LINE);
fw.write( taskInList.getType() + TASK_DETAILS_SEPERATOR + taskInList.getStatusIcon() + TASK_DETAILS_SEPERATOR + taskInList.getTaskName() + TASK_DETAILS_SEPERATOR + NEW_LINE);
* This class is for all operations involving Tasklist which stores all the tasks
public static ArrayList<Task> taskList = new ArrayList<Task>();
* Constructor used to initialise task list from arraylist that is retrieved from file
* Add task of type todo to taskList
* @param input task details for task type todo
System.out.println("Got it. I've added this task:");
* Add task of type event to taskList
* @param input task details for task type event
System.out.println("Got it. I've added this task:");
* Add task of type deadline to taskList
* @param input task details for task type deadline
System.out.println("Got it. I've added this task:");
* Mark a task in taskList as complete based on index
* @param input user input of task they want to mark as complete
System.out.println("Nice! I've marked this task as done:\n");
* @param list Arraylist of tasks to traverse and print out
System.out.println("Here are the tasks in your list:");
* Pretty print number of tasks in list based on input
* @param taskCounter counter to print out neatly
System.out.println("Now you have " + taskCounter + " tasks in the list.");
* Mark a task in taskList as incomplete (using unmark command) based on index
* @param input user input of task they want to mark/unmark as incomplete
System.out.println("Ok I have marked this task as incomplete:\n");
* Delete a task in taskList based on index
* @param input user input of task they want to mark as complete
System.out.println("Ok I have deleted this task as requested:\n");
* Find a task in taskList based on matchingsearch input string
* @param input user input of task they want to find all occurances of search string
* To generate a Duke Exception and print out message
* @param message input message to print out
* This class is used to keep track of all the errors
public static final String  INPUT_ERROR = " Please specify an appropriate command for me to execute";
public static final String  INVALID_TASK_NAME_ERROR = " Hi I need a valid task name";
public static final String  INVALID_TASK_DETAILS_ERROR = " Hi your task details is incomplete";
public static final String  INVALID_TASK_MARK_ERROR = " Hi I need a valid task number";
public static final String  INVALID_TASK_DELETE_ERROR = " Hi I need a valid task number to delete";
public static final String  FILE_NOT_FOUND = " FILE NOT FOUND";
public static final String  IO_ERROR= " IO ERROR DETECTED";
public static final String DATE_STRING_PATTERN = "MMM dd yyyy";
* Get task name of task type deadline
* @param taskDetails string to retrieve task name from
* Based on user input generate and return a date object
* @param dateString user input of date string
System.out.println("Error Please input a date in format yyyy-mm-dd");
* Get deadline date of task type deadline
* @param input user input of deadline task
* Get task name of task type eve t
* Get deadtime of event of task of type Event
* @param task task object to print out details
* Get task name of task type todo
* @param taskDetails string to retrieve task name from
System.out.println("Hello! I'm Ibrahimramos, your friendly multi-racial bot\nWhat can I do for you?");
* Take user input from command line and execute the respective commands based on input until user inputs bye and exits program
System.out.println("Bye. Hope to see you again soon!");
